TopicTitle: realism overhaul vab issus please help !

Articles.Content:
i enter the vab and it lets me place one item but i try to add another and it dont let me attach it and after a few attempts it will not let me move the one item i did put down. also it will not let me leave the vab i just click leave over and over and nothing happens. i click on other parts and nothing happens also another weird thing. the green attachment nods will show up in grandom spots in the vab by them selfs. kind of like something is there but you cant see it. it seems this only accures when i try to add a parachute.
